name: Mawari & Nexus Multi-Node Environment
postCreateCommand: bash -c 'sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install -y curl wget jq && npm install -g ethers && chmod +x /workspaces/Mawari-Nexus-Multi/mawari/*.sh && chmod +x /workspaces/Mawari-Nexus-Multi/nexus/*.sh && echo "### Running Mawari Setup..." && bash /workspaces/Mawari-Nexus-Multi/mawari/first-setup.sh'
postAttachCommand: bash -c 'echo "### Triggering Mawari & Nexus Auto-Start..." && bash /workspaces/Mawari-Nexus-Multi/mawari/auto-start.sh & bash /workspaces/Mawari-Nexus-Multi/nexus/auto-start.sh &'
